steps.28: add-Measure 1/8 teaspoon of salt and add it to the mug
steps.29: Sprinkle-Sprinkle dried Italian herbs inside the mug
steps.31: spread-spread marinara sauce around the surface of the batter
steps.32: Microwave-Microwave for 1 minute 20 seconds, or until it rises and the toppings are bubbling
steps.33: add-Measure 4 tablespoons of flour and add it to the mug
steps.34: Add-1 tablespoon of olive oil to the mug
steps.35: add-Measure 1/16 teaspoon of baking soda and add it to the mug
steps.37: Mix-Mix the contents of the mug thoroughly. (There might be some lumps, but that is ok.)
steps.38: Stir-Stir the contents in the mug well
steps.39: Sprinkle-Sprinkle 1 generous tablespoon of mozzarella cheese on top of the sauce
steps.40: add-Measure 1/8 teaspoon of baking powder and add it to the mug
steps.41: Add-Add in 3 tablespoons of milk to the mug
